solution_line_template: {num_children} children took {sweets_per_child} each for a total of {num_children}*{sweets_per_child} = <<{num_children}*{sweets_per_child}={sweets_taken}>>{sweets_taken} sweets
If there is {fraction_left} left then {sweets_taken} is {whole_amount}-({fraction_left}) = {fraction_taken} of the original amount (The whole packet minus 1 third)

Multiplying both sides of the equation by ({reciprocal_numerator}/{reciprocal_denominator}) gives: original amount = {sweets_taken}*({reciprocal_numerator}/{reciprocal_denominator}) = <<{sweets_taken}*{reciprocal_numerator}/{reciprocal_denominator}={original_amount}>>{original_amount}
